input.sentences: i made a cake for the party today .
i also made some other food .
we made a big fire to cook it all with .
it was a lot of fun .
output.sentences: She made a cake for the party tonight.
She served her friends some brats.
She kept the grill stocked with wood so the fire was hot.
Her friends continued to show up all through the evening.
The party was a great success and everyone had a lot of fun.
